00007 bool
00008 MMLmtext::validate() {
00009         if (validated) {
00010                 return valid;
00011         }
00012         validated = true;
00013         valid = true;
00014         // an mi element may only contain MMLtext elements
00015         MMLNode *n;
00016         for (n = first; valid && n; n = getNext(n)) {
00017                 valid = n->isText();
00018         }
00019         if (!valid) {
00020                 errmsg = "An mtext element may contain only text and no elements.";
00021         }
00022         return valid;
00023 }
